titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Irving S. Cutter Collection, circa 1850-circa 1940
titlestmt.author: Processed by Keith Reynolds

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Keith Reynolds December 2010

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

did.abstract: Collection contains glass plate negatives and lantern slides relating to Western and Native American history.

bioghist.head: Biography of Irving S Cutter
bioghist.p: Dr. Irving S. Cutter (1875-1945) was the dean of the Medical School at Northwestern University from 1925 to 1941. Dr. Cutter was also an author and book collector and was interested in a variety of topics including Western and Native American History.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection contains lantern slides and glass plate negatives created and collected by Dr. Irving S. Cutter relating to Western U.S. and Native American History. Topics include Dr. Edwin James (a member of the Stephen H. Long 1819-1820 expedition to the Rocky Mountains) and George Armstrong Custer.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on the materials for research purposes, and the collection is open to the public.

userestrict.head: Copyright Information
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for observing all copyright, property, and libel laws as they apply.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: There are no known other archival collections created by Irving S. Cutter at the date of processing.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This material was donated by Mrs. Irving S. Cutter and shipped by Charles R. Stearns in 1958 and 1959.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The collection was processed by Keith Reynolds in December 2010.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Item Description, Box Number, Folder Number, Collection Name, Collection Number, American Heritage Center, University of Wyoming.
